verses.verse: And the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying,
Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, put forth <WH2330> a riddle <WH2420>, and speak <WH4911> a parable <WH4912> unto the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>;

And say <WH559>, Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; A great <WH1419> eagle <WH5404> with great <WH1419> wings <WH3671>, longwinged <WH83>, full <WH4392> of feathers <WH5133>, which had various colors <WH7553>, came <WH935> unto Lebanon <WH3844>, and took <WH3947> the highest branch <WH6788> of the cedar <WH730>:
He cropped off <WH6998> the top <WH7218> of his young twigs <WH3242>, and carried <WH935> it into a land <WH776> of traffic <WH3667>; he set <WH7760> it in a city <WH5892> of merchants <WH7402>.

He took <WH3947> also of the seed <WH2233> of the land <WH776>, and planted <WH5414> it in a fruitful <WH2233> field <WH7704>; he placed <WH3947> it by great <WH7227> waters <WH4325>, and set <WH7760> it as a willow tree <WH6851>.

And it grew <WH6779>, and became a spreading <WH5628> vine <WH1612> of low <WH8217> stature <WH6967>, whose branches <WH1808> turned <WH6437> toward him <WH8328>, and the roots there were under him <WH1612>: so it became a vine, and brought forth <WH6213> branches <WH905>, and shot <WH7971> forth sprigs <WH6288>.

There was also another <WH259> great <WH1419> eagle <WH5404> with great <WH1419> wings <WH3671> and many <WH7227> feathers <WH5133>: and <WH1612>, behold, this vine did bend <WH3719> her roots <WH8328> toward him <WH7971>, and shot forth her branches <WH1808> toward him <WH8248>, that he might water it by the furrows <WH6170> of her plantation <WH4302>.

It was planted <WH8362> in a good <WH2896> soil <WH7704> by great <WH7227> waters <WH4325>, that it might bring forth <WH6213> branches <WH6057>, and that it might bear <WH5375> fruit <WH6529>, that it might be a good <WH155> vine <WH1612>.

Say <WH559> you <WH559>, Thus says the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; Shall it prosper <WH6743>? shall he not pull up <WH5423> the roots <WH8328> there <WH7082>, and cut off the fruit <WH6529> there <WH3001>, that it wither? it shall wither <WH3001> in all the leaves <WH2964> of her spring <WH6780>, even without great <WH1419> power <WH2220> or many <WH7227> people <WH5971> to pluck it up <WH5375> by the roots there <WH8328>.

Yes <WH8362>, behold, being planted, shall it prosper <WH6743>? shall it not utterly <WH3001> wither <WH3001>, when the east <WH6921> wind <WH7307> touches <WH5060> it <WH3001>? it shall wither in the furrows <WH6170> where it grew <WH6780>.
Moreover the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying,

Say <WH559> now to the rebellious <WH4805> house <WH1004>, Know <WH3045> you not what these things mean <WH559>? tell them <WH4428>, Behold, the king of Babylon <WH894> is come <WH935> to Jerusalem <WH3389>, and has taken <WH3947> the king <WH4428> there <WH8269>, and the princes there <WH935>, and led them with him to Babylon <WH894>;

And has taken <WH3947> of the king <WH4410>'s seed <WH2233>, and made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with him <WH935>, and has taken a oath <WH423> of him <WH3947>: he has also taken the mighty <WH352> of the land <WH776>:
That the kingdom <WH4467> might be base <WH8217>, that it might not lift itself up <WH5375>, but that by keeping <WH8104> of his covenant <WH1285> it might stand <WH5975>.

But he rebelled <WH4775> against him in sending <WH7971> his ambassadors <WH4397> into Egypt <WH4714>, that they might give <WH5414> him horses <WH5483> and much <WH7227> people <WH5971>. Shall he prosper <WH6743>? shall he escape <WH4422> that does <WH6213> such things <WH6565>? or shall he break the covenant <WH1285>, and be delivered <WH4422>?

As I live <WH2416>, says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>, surely in the place <WH4725> where the king <WH4428> dwells that made him king <WH4427>, whose oath <WH423> he despised <WH959>, and whose covenant <WH1285> he broke <WH6565>, even with him in the midst <WH8432> of Babylon <WH894> he shall die <WH4191>.

Neither shall Pharaoh <WH6547> with his mighty <WH1419> army <WH2428> and great <WH7227> company <WH6951> make <WH6213> for him in the war <WH4421>, by casting up <WH8210> mounts <WH5550>, and building <WH1129> forts <WH1785>, to cut off <WH3772> many <WH7227> persons <WH5315>:

Seeing he despised <WH959> the oath <WH423> by breaking <WH6565> the covenant <WH1285>, when <WH5414>, behold, he had given his hand <WH3027>, and has done <WH6213> all these things <WH4422>, he shall not escape.

Therefore thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; As I live <WH2416>, surely my oath <WH423> that he has despised <WH959>, and my covenant <WH1285> that he has broken <WH6331>, even it will I recompense <WH5414> upon his own head <WH7218>.

And I will spread <WH6566> my net <WH7568> upon him <WH8610>, and he shall be taken in my snare <WH4686>, and I will bring <WH935> him to Babylon <WH894>, and will plead <WH8199> with him there for his trespass <WH4603> that he has trespassed against me <WH4604>.

And all his fugitives <WH4015> with all his bands <WH102> shall fall <WH5307> by the sword <WH2719>, and they that remain <WH7604> shall be scattered <WH6566> toward all winds <WH7307>: and you shall know <WH3045> that I the Lord <WH3068> have spoken it <WH1696>.

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; I will also take <WH3947> of the highest branch <WH6788> of the high <WH7311> cedar <WH730>, and will set <WH5414> it <WH6998>; I will crop off from the top <WH7218> of his young twigs <WH3127> a tender one <WH7390>, and will plant <WH8362> it upon a high <WH1364> mountain <WH2022> and eminent <WH8524>:

In the mountain <WH2022> of the height <WH4791> of Israel <WH3478> will I plant <WH8362> it <WH5375>: and it shall bring forth boughs <WH6057>, and bear <WH6213> fruit <WH6529>, and be a good <WH117> cedar <WH730>: and under it shall live <WH7931> all bird <WH6833> of every wing <WH3671>; in the shadow <WH6738> of the branches <WH1808> there shall they live <WH7931>.

And all the trees <WH6086> of the field <WH7704> shall know <WH3045> that I the Lord <WH3068> have brought down <WH8213> the high <WH1364> tree <WH6086>, have exalted <WH1361> the low <WH8217> tree <WH6086>, have dried <WH3001> up the green <WH3892> tree <WH6086>, and have made the dry <WH3002> tree <WH6086> to flourish <WH6524>: I the Lord <WH3068> have spoken <WH1696> and have done it <WH6213>.
